DOC.brief_title: Metabolic Study Concentric Eccentric Muscle Training
DOC.detailed_description: Physical exercise decrease risk obesity , diabetes mellitus , cardiovascular disease . Skeletal muscle exercise two way : Concentric contraction define active shortening muscle , e.g . stepping upwards , whereas eccentric muscle contraction define active resistance stretching , e.g . stepping downwards . Although effect exercise ( i.e . combination concentric eccentric muscle contraction ) metabolic parameter extensively investigate , data specific metabolic effect concentric versus eccentric muscle work human . Comparison ( ) : Metabolic anti-inflammatory effect eccentric endurance exercise ( i.e . step upwards ) , compare metabolic anti-inflammatory effect concentric exercise ( i.e . step downwards ) .
DOC.criteria: healthy men woman age 30 year previous systematic endurance training ( ≥3 time per week ≥30 min ) body mass index > 30 kg/m2 heavy smoking ( > 20 cigarette per day ) regular alcohol consumption > 60g per day establish musculoskeletal disease history cardiovascular disease diabetes mellitus unwillingness stay area whole study period
